source: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_SEQ_00<tab>M'linhbo finds herself between a rock and a hard place.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_SEQ_00<tab>ピーリングストーンズのメ・リンボは、力強い助っ人を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_TODO_00<tab>Slay highland dharas, then defeat the gold dust dhara when it appears.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_TODO_00を討伐し、
おびき寄せたを討伐

source: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_001<tab>Well, I'll be! You're the adventurer from Castellum Velodyna, aren't you? You put on quite a show down there. I'm sure you hear this all the time, but we could really use a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of your talents right about now.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_001ベロジナ大橋でのあなたの活躍、ここからバッチリ見ていたわよ。
まさに、獅子奮迅の活躍だったわね。
その腕を見込んで、頼みたいことがあるの。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_002<tab>Dharas have been croppin' up to the south of here, and they've been givin' us no small amount of trouble.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_002南の廃墟近くの狩場に、が現れるようになって、
とても困ってるのよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_003<tab>We do what we can to keep 'em at bay, but every once in a while we'll come across a mountainous mess of gold-dusted rock that sends us runnin' with our tails between our legs. I imagine handlin' a few dharas would be like swattin' flies for you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_003特に、巨大な個体のは、
私たちじゃ手も足も出ない相手だわ……。
だから、勇猛なあなたに頼みたいの！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_004<tab>If you go and tear down a few dharas, one of those golden monstrosities is bound to show up. Topplin' even one would go a long way to helpin' us take back our huntin' grounds.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_004南の廃墟で「」を倒し続けることで、
「」をおびき出すことができるはず……。
お願い……私たちの狩場を取り戻して！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_005<tab>Just keep beatin' up the dharas, and those golden critters are sure to turn up. Be careful, though. They're like to be angry for you slayin' their kin.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_005「」を倒し続けることで、
「」をおびき出すことができるはず……。
お願い、私たちの狩場を取り戻して！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_010<tab>No need to explain. I saw the whole thing from here. You were every bit as amazin' as I had hoped.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_010あなたがアイツを倒すところ、ここから見てたわよ。
やはり、討伐を依頼して正解だったわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_011<tab>A shame those things are like to come back after a while. People say they're born from the spirits of warriors who've fallen in battle.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_011アイツらは、岩石にエーテルが宿って生まれる、土の精よ。
私たちの一族に伝わる伝承によれば、大きな戦いが起こった後、
無念に散った死者の魂が宿って生まれると言われているの。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_014<tab>Personally, I think it has somethin' to do with the aether around here, but I've been prayin' for an end to the war all the same. Take care, friend. I'll be cheerin' for you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ717_02820_MLINHBO_000_014それがおとぎ話なのか、真実なのかはわからないけれど、
この地から戦乱が早くなくなることを祈るしかないわね。
冒険者さん、力を貸してくれてありがとう。
